name: Assomineraria
goal: Assomineraria, the Italian Petroleum and Mining Industry Association, represents the companies operating on the national territory in the exploration and production of oil and natural gas, industrial and energy minerals, as well as geothermal fluids. It also represents the companies supplying equipment and services to the petroleum and mining industry.
interests: Climate Action, Competition, Energy, Environment, Research and innovation, Taxation
euInitiatives: legislation related to Energy, Resources, Environment, Safety, Hydrocarbons, Mining and Equipment and Services.
